Articles.Content: I could be wrong, but, I swear there was a new tool in KSP to make your own kerbal and have it be like Jeb for example, but, with your own name. I cannot find this little feature anywhere in the game. I am running 1.2.2 <currently vanilla stock, last I played, it had mods, I come back, 1.2.2 is sitting there and my mods are gone... oh steam what did you do?> any way, am I going mad from too much school and too many videos, or am I just not seeing it? as I await your kind help, I shall continue my hunt thru menu after menu...

Perhaps this is what you are thinking of, the now discontinued kerbal ap

 

https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/index.php?p=24

3 minutes ago, sjwt said:

Perhaps this is what you are thinking of, the now discontinued kerbal ap

 

https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/index.php?p=24

@sjwt i found it under alt-f12 of all places after a few twitch viewers pointed it to me, but thanks for the point-at-an ap  btw, since its answered. also, ill mark this as answered and it can be locked if yall like
